 That wasn't the smartest thing to do. High horsepower cars are squirrely by nature. Putting all of that horsepower to a road that may have less than perfect traction is a recipe for disaster. And allowing spectators to be along the sides without any safety barriers is inexcusable.

My predictions for the final 4. 
 
 Gold: Canada
 
 Silver: USA
 
 Bronze: Slovakia
 
 4th: Finland
 
 I would love to see the US win it, but I just don't think we will stack up to Canada again. They are just too strong and getting better every time they play. I think it was a great move to bench Brodeur, but I can't believe they are playing Luongo instead of Fleury. Fleury is the best keeper in the game.
